author: Hazeley
text:
I just thought it helpful to give some feedback on my experiences with this site.  Firstly, as a buyer its been remarkably its been trouble free.  However, as a seller its been a total nightmare! Vestiaire appear only to be interested in their buyers, and offer very little, if no support, to their sellers despite the fact that they take sizeable commission from each item you sell.  I have had buyers wear and worse still damage my designer items, then return the goods and Vestiaire immediately refund them their money, before you have a chance to report back as to the condition your returned items were received back in.    It's been an uphill battle.   The final straw has been trying to get them to send me a shipping label after their system failed.  So far I have spent 5 hours on the case and each time I contact them I get fobbed off with no solution in sight.
If you have the patience of a saint and money to waste on you designer items, then this is the site for you.  If not, my advise is steer clear as a seller!
title: Sellers Beware ..... prepare for a battle!

author: Victoria Diaz
text:

During these 3 months I've contacted VC customer service several times but no one solved, nor informed me where my item was. In fact I have downloaded a chat where one of your customer representatives  where this person (Bart) ensured me my item (11617815) was safely guarded at VC France warehouse. This is ended to be FALSE as other customer service told me they have lost the item. The mistreatment VC displays against sellers is outrageous. After 3 months VC refuses to pay for my sweatshirt as it shows to be lost.

They constantly push you to lower prices, to send in time, to take good pictures, to contact buyers and send messages of promotions to people that mark your products, but they delay payments, lost your things and NEVER take responsibility for lost items. 
I want a full refund for my lost. I need a person in this company to contact me with to solve this problem. After 3 months nobody takes responsibility and they don't want to refund me for an item THEY HAVE LOST.

author: Micci
text:
To be fair, there was a good product I was satisfied with in the past.

However, what I disappointed this time was the response when the condition of the product I purchased didn’t match the description.

The item was described as a good condition, but in fact there were multiple tears in the silk fabric. This was not stated in the description or in the pictures at all, and the item was clearly eligible for return.

I contacted customer service and received an immediate response, but what they recommended was to re-list this item. The guideline states that if the item description does not match the actual condition, customers can return it. They disregarded their guideline and I didn’t understand completely their customer services. 

I felt like their reply was just a template when they received unsatisfactory comments. I don’t think they investigated the difference between a photo of damaged areas I sent and the description and photos listed on the site.

I also disappointed that their authentication team did not notice the difference between the product description and the actual condition during the process. What are we paying the authentication fee for?

I sincerely hope that the company will respond in good faith and improve their service in the future.
title: Multiple tears on fabric that were not mentioned in descriptions or pictures

author: Mai Do
text:
This is a warning!!!!!!!!

Please DO NOT spend your money at Vestiaire Collective. Your money deserves something much much better. 

I had very bad experience buying at Vestiaire. I bought a Chanel bag (unfortunately my first spending at Vestiaire is such expensive item) from a Trusted seller. I was expecting so much because in the photos the seller uploaded, the bag looks perfect without any imperfection. 

However, the first impression was so disappointed. 
- Right next to the bag lock is a terrible scratched area. Then I was so worried checking all of the bag. In the bottom part is another huge scratches. The surface of the bag is filled with uncountable small scratches, looks like someone used the nail to damage the leather. 
- The serial number, which used to be attached to a Chanel bag is removed. 

Those damaged things were totally not mentioned in the description. 

I contacted the customer support team. First she said “ I am happy to tell you that this return has been accepted“. Wow, “what a good service” - I thought. I sent the item back to them. And after a few days, I received an email from DHL. YES, FROM DHL. And NOT from Vestiaire, that I will receive a package sending from Vestiaire on the next day. 

No NOTIFICATION, no EXPLANATION. 

After I received the bag, I contacted the customer service again and ask them “Why did you send back the item to me without any notification?” Should I deserve an explanation? 

Then I received an answer that they checked the bag and it is the same as the seller’s description. WOW. Where on earth stated in the description that the bag was damaged?????? 

I sent them the photo of the description, and asked them to show me. Where, where did they see that the seller wrote these problems? 

They asked me to send the item again for a second check. Ok, I sent the item right on the next day. 

And after a few days, AGAIN!!!!, yesterday I received an email FROM DHL, that I will receive a package sending from TCG VG (definitely the bag, because the notification from DHL has the description of the item). I was SO SO SO SO SURPRISED. They did it again. They are sending back the bag to me WITHOUT ANY NOTIFICATION - AGAIN. 

And it is Christmas time. I supposed to visit my parents from this weekend, and I’m not going to be home in the next two weeks. What should I do???? Staying here and waiting for a mistaken happened twice? If not, what will happen to that thousands euro bag? 

That is my money. I spent years to have that money. I put TRUST on Vestiaire. I was thinking a month before buying from them. What I received is DISAPPOINTMENT and DISRESPECTFUL. 

So please please please, don’t waste your money to buy anything from this website. They receive the commission to have quality check service. But their SERVICE is only a FRAUD. There is no service provided by their EXPERTS.
title: This is a warning!!!!!!!! Do not waste your money and time

author: Rosalind Caplan
text:
I am utterly disgusted with Vestiaire Collective.I sold a vintage dress which the buyer returned,with false claims that the condition was not as described.After many emails ,Vestiaire said to send the dress back to them & they would sell it on their account & I would receive payment two weeks from receiving the dress.I have not been payed & whats more they are passing me from one representative to another.
This has been the most distressing experience I have ever had with any company. They obviously don’t care about their customers, 
If by any chance I do receive payment I will edit this review.
19/12 I have just received an email saying that I will receive payment on 23/12 so if this transpires I will be delighted! We shall see!
It is now 28th December & as yet I have not received payment, It was to have appeared on my bank statement within 4 days.!!!
Once again I was promised that the payment would be today,the 29th December & guess what!! It’s not!! There’s no excuse for this it’s just dishonest practice.
I have now received a message that is basically calling me a liar & saying the payment has been made!! Unbelievable!!
The last email that I received today is now trying to put the blame on my bank! My husband went to the bank & there is no payment. I am so upset , I can’t believe that a company can behave this way
This is my last posting, having realized that they actually hadn’t sent my payment, as if by magic it was payed yesterday & in my account today.
I can honestly say that I have had to fight so hard for anything that was rightfully mine in all my 78 years
